pageContext.claim: “'President Trump would need a magic wand to get to 4% GDP,' stated President Obama. I guess I have a magic wand, 4.2%, and we will do MUCH better than this! We have just begun.”
pageContext.analysis: When Trump was elected, the economy already was doing well, with the unemployment rate falling and the stock market rising. The trends were likely to have continued under a Democratic administration and Trump has no basis to claim the economy would have suddenly reversed course. Obama topped 5 percent GDP growth in one quarter.
